structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Acceptance of instrument constitutes dedication -- Term of easement and covenant.
law.text: The execution and acceptance of an instrument described in KRS 65.410(4), shall constitute a dedication to the public of the scenic character of the lands for the term specified. Any such easement and covenant shall run for a term of not less than 30 years.
